name: Devil's Kitchen
description:
You are the devil's cook and you are busy. This job is litarly hell. Have I already mentioned that the devil gets angry if you are not fast enough?

Be quick, be fast - HE is hungry!!

Controls: use c and x (QWERTZ Keyboard) for x and o, Arrowkeys for movement

You can ajust controls in the mainmenu and in the ESC Menu
